name: Copons/Steam
desc:
An almost-fully-working prototype of a fully web based replacement for the Steam client library.
Its development halted when I learned that Steam APIs update habits are erratic at best and mostly disrespectful to older versions.
This is my own account's public profile showcasing part of the app's features.
